description:
Franky`s backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Tom`s life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le complot de Spandam. Le jour où le train des mers a vacillé
Spandam`s Scheme! The Day the Sea Train Shook!
Spandum no Inbou! Umi Ressha ga Yureta Hi
Конспирация Спандама! День, когда морепоезд вздрогнул
スパンダムの陰謀! 海列車が揺れた日
